Types

All of the types that are mentioned on the wiki and is mostly here for annotations and highlighting.

Types suffixed with ? indicate that they're optional and can be substituted with nil.

Types
any

Accepts any value.

bool

A binary value of true or false, also known as a boolean.

number

All numbers in lua use double-precision floating points, though not all functions (especially engine ones) will accept the full range available.

string
function
table
Vector
Angle
Color
Entity
npc_class

Accepts either a CLASS_ enum or a string for custom relationship classes.

NPC
